JobFullDesc: The Integrity Investigations and Intelligence team is dedicated to protecting the users of the Facebook family of applications (e.g. Facebook, Instagram, WhatsApp, Oculus) from a multitude of threats including: dangerous organizations and individuals, advanced threat/nation-state actors, and human trafficking and exploitation. We are seeking an experienced threat investigator to detect and track adversary groups both on and off the Facebook platform, investigate complex threats, advance investigative methods, and use innovative approaches to protecting people from offline harm. You will have the opportunity to work on some of the most challenging, complicated, and high-visibility security risks the company is facing. The ideal candidate will be an innovative self-starter, who is motivated by our mission and results-driven, and will be able to extract, assimilate, and correlate a wide variety of data in order to surface and disrupt sophisticated actors.  The candidate must have a deep understanding of scripting languages such as PHP or Python and will be expected to be comfortable with various technical investigative skills.Proactively hunt for threats and undetected abuse by leveraging internal data, open-source intelligence, and third party private intelligence.Investigate complex cases to understand in granular detail how abuse is occurring and attribute the person(s) responsible. Identify and implement appropriate online and offline enforcement strategies to mitigate harm both in the current case and from similar forward-looking abuse.Research how threats show up within the ecosystem and deeply understand how abuse manifests. Discover and clearly explain emerging threats and trends, with an emphasis on geopolitical, cultural or societal-specific differences where appropriate.Analyze and interpret large datasets to advance investigations, quantify trends or support findings.Identify effective strategies to prevent or disrupt abuse at scale.
